div.div: We should guaranty that activities of children happen in a safe environment exempt of accidents, fights, abuse any bulling. Safety include conducts between children and with respect to the staff and outsider volunteers. We should avoid dangerous situations like cutting objects or neglected places or situations and provide a plan for caring of the children in case of accidents. We support projects that provide a refuge to children from the outside world. Any discrimination, sexual and physical abuse of any kind must not be tolerated.
